comments.en:
For basic printing functionality use the HPIJS driver . For advanced functionality such as printer status and maintenance features, use the HPLIP driver (which includes HPIJS).

To get its maximum quality, use the "hpijs" driver. 600 dpi in colour is not supported by the hardware.

A printhead alignment tool is available in metalab's system/printing directory.

Same printer as the DeskJet 670C.

Color printing with the GS "cdj670" driver is noticably inferior to Windows drivers. It'll do the job for web pages and diagrams, but trying to print your color pictures will depress you. Printing with the ESP Print Pro demo is also not up to snuff.
